short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you keep track of your wagering amounts and free spins.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The team at Team Casino have launched a completely free chrome extension to help everyone's casino offer tracking.

Team Casino Notes has been designed to help keep track of your balances, spins/hands and wagering requirements when completing an offer. 

Features include:

- Counter to track anything; spins, autospins completed, blackjack hands played etc.
- Balance tracker to track your starting and end balance and overall profit/loss when completing an offer.
- Wagering requirement calculator. 
- Blackjack strategy pop out.

Hope you enjoy this free extension and that it helps make your casino offers easier to manage.

Any questions, feedback or feature suggestions please email, support@teamcasino.com

Thanks!
